The "Creative Coding Adventure" online course: Description: In this course, students will learn how to code and create their own games, apps, and interactive art pieces using a variety of programming languages and tools. The course will be structured as a scavenger hunt, where students are given a series of challenges and puzzles to solve, with each one building upon the last. Students will learn about different programming concepts, such as loops, conditionals, functions, and data structures, while also developing their problem-solving skills and creativity.

The "Digital Storytelling Masterclass" online course: Description: In this course, students will learn how to create compelling digital stories using a variety of multimedia tools and platforms. Students will learn about the different elements of storytelling, such as character development, plot structure, and pacing, and how to apply these elements in a digital context. The course will include assignments and projects that encourage students to create their own digital stories, such as short films, interactive narratives, and virtual reality experiences.

The "Design Thinking Bootcamp" online course: Description: In this course, students will learn the principles of design thinking and how to apply them to solve real-world problems. Students will learn about empathy, ideation, prototyping, and testing, and how to use these techniques to create innovative solutions to complex challenges. The course will include group projects and activities that encourage students to work together to solve real-world problems, such as designing a new product or service.

The "AI for Social Impact" online course: Description: In this course, students will learn about the potential of artificial intelligence (AI) to solve some of the world's most pressing social and environmental challenges. Students will learn about the different applications of AI, such as natural language processing, computer vision, and machine learning, and how these technologies can be used to improve healthcare, education, and sustainability. The course will include case studies and projects that encourage students to think critically about the ethical and social implications of AI and how they can use these technologies to make a positive impact on the world.
